Quickstrike:




"It's simple," Quickstrike said to Venomous, and lead the way to the 
monitoring room. It was a good thing he made some time to explore the 
ship, or otherwise he would have some trouble finding it, which would 
make this sub-commander look bad. 

He opened the room. The lights came on automaticly, which he thought 
was a neat trick. He walked over to a seat with multible monitors, 
varing in sizes in front of it. It had a device below the last row of 
monitors that looked like a keyboard. He rested an arm on the chair 
and looked at the monitors. He noticed someone on the external 
monitors.

"Uh-oh." 

It was Scorponok. 

Quickstrike jerked up. "Auto-guns, target unit Scorponok an' fire!" 
he commanded. The external auto-guns turned onto Scorponok's position 
and fired multible times on  him.
